summary.span: 获取或设置列中数据的最大大小（字节）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 列中数据的最大大小（字节）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 默认值将根据参数值进行推断。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于二进制和字符串类型。The property is used for binary and string types. 对于非字符串数据类型和 ANSI 字符串数据， 属性是指字节数。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. 对于 Unicode 字符串数据， 是指字符数。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字符串的计数不包括终止字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 对于可变长度数据类型， 描述要传输到服务器的最大数据量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，对于 Unicode 字符串值，可以使用 将发送到服务器的数据量限制为前100个字符。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 对于双向参数、输出参数和返回值，必须设置 的值。For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of . 这不是输入参数所必需的，如果未显式设置此值，则在执行参数化语句时，将从指定参数的实际大小推断出该值。This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed. 参数的 和 属性可通过设置 进行推断。The and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此，您不需要指定它们。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 但是，它们不 属性设置公开。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如，如果已推断出参数的大小，则在语句执行后 不包含推断值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, does not contain inferred value after statement execution. 对于固定长度数据类型，将忽略 的值。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 可以检索它以提供信息，并返回将参数值传输到服务器时提供程序使用的最大字节数。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. 如果为 提供的值的大小超过指定的 ，则 的 将包含指定的值，并将其截断为 大小。If the size of the value supplied for a exceeds the specified , the of the will contain the specified value, truncated to the Size of the . `DbType`类型的参数。`String`中， 的值是 Unicode 字符的长度。For parameters of type `DbType`.`String`, the value of is length in Unicode characters. `DbType`类型的参数。`Xml`， 会被忽略。For parameters of type `DbType`.`Xml`, is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置源列的名称，该源列映射到 并用于加载或返回 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the and used for loading or returning the .

value.span: 映射到 的源列的名称。

span.span: The name of the source column mapped to the .
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为空字符串以外的任何值，则将从具有 名称的列中检索参数的值。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the name. 如果 设置为 `Input`，则从 获取值。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果 设置为 `Output`，则从数据源获取值。If is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. `InputOutput` 的 是两者的组合。A of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 有关如何使用 属性的详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)和[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示源列是否可以为 null。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 通过此操作， 能够为可以为 null 的列正确地生成 Update 语句。

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果源列可以为 null，则为 ；如果不可以为 null，则为 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理可以为 null 的列时， 使用 来正确生成更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 通常，使用 仅限于从 继承的开发人员。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用此属性来确定源列是否可以为 null，并将此属性设置为可以为 null 的情况下 `true` `false`，如果不是，则设置为。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 当 生成其 Update 语句时，它会检查每个参数的 。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果该属性 `true`， 将生成如下 WHERE 子句（在此查询表达式中，"FieldName" 表示字段的名称）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果对字段 `false`， 将生成以下 WHERE 子句：If for the field is `false`, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外，如果源字段包含 null，则 @IsNull_FieldName 包含1，如果不包含 null，则为0。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 此机制允许在 SQL Server 中进行性能优化，并提供适用于跨多个提供程序的通用代码。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于输入参数，值将绑定到发送到服务器的 。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出和返回值参数，值将在 完成时和 关闭后设置。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 将 null 参数值发送到服务器时，必须指定 ，而不是 null。When you send a null parameter value to the server, you must specify , not null. 系统中的 NULL 值是没有值的空对象。The null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. 用于表示 NULL 值。 is used to represent null values. 如果应用程序指定了数据库类型，则当提供程序将数据发送到服务器时，绑定值将转换为该类型。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 如果提供程序支持 接口，则会尝试转换任何类型的值。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型与值不兼容，则可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 属性可通过设置值进行推断。The property can be inferred by setting the Value. `DbDataAdapter.Update`将覆盖 属性。The property is overwritten by `DbDataAdapter.Update`.
